verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kristu,
utuombee kwa Baba,
tuwe na umoja.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nakuomba,
Baba
ili wawe na umoja,
kama sisi tulivyo umoja.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ulimwengu upake kuamini,
kwamba wewe ulinituma.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nakuomba wawe,
ndani yetu,
kama vile wewe
ulivyo ndani yangu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mimi nimewapa
utukufu ule ule,
ulionipa mimi.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Mimi niwe,
ndani yao,
uwe ndani yangu.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Nakuomba hao,
ulionipa,
wawe pamoja
nami pale nilipo.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Nina kondoo,
wengine,
ambao hawamo zizini
humu.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Yanibidi kuwaleta,
hao pia,
nao watasikia
sauti yangu.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Nao watakuwa,
kundi moja,
lenye mchungaji mmoja.
